Key Match Events: India scored 171/7, England was bowled out for 103, resulting in a 68-run victory for India
Post-Match Reflections: India's quest for a world title is well on course
Rohit Sharma's intent and risk-taking were key factors in India's victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch was slow and low, making runs difficult to come by
Others: Rohit Sharma scored 57 runs, Suryakumar Yadav scored 47 runs, Adil Rashid was the pick of the English bowlers with 3-37
